Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Door latch mechanism failure to engage. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 10/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
